entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:55 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 06:52 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
